revision.text:
{|class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Dex # !! Berry !! Harvest
Amount !! Farm Points !! Growth times !! How to obtain !! Special Abilities |- | #55 [[File:Micle.png|25px]] || [[Micle]] || style="text-align:right" | 1 || style="text-align:right" | 2600 {{farmpoints}} || 8 hr 48 min to ripe
8 hr 48 min to death || Fill the farm with ≥ 600 Dry points and at least one empty plot || N/A |- | #56 [[File:Custap.png|25px]] || [[Custap]] || style="text-align:right" | 1 || style="text-align:right" | 2700 {{farmpoints}} || 7 hr 36 min to ripe
7 hr 36 min to death || Fill the farm with ≥ 600 Sweet points and at least one empty plot || N/A |- | #57 [[File:Jaboca.png|25px]] || [[Jaboca]] || style="text-align:right" | 1 || style="text-align:right" | 2800 {{farmpoints}} || 9 hr 18 min to ripe
9 hr 18 min to death || Fill the farm with ≥ 600 Bitter points and at least one empty plot || Roamer Chance ↑ |- | #58 [[File:Rowap.png|25px]] || [[Rowap]] || style="text-align:right" | 1 || style="text-align:right" | 2900 {{farmpoints}} || 5 hr 54 min to ripe
5 hr 54 min to death || Fill the farm with ≥ 600 Sour points and at least one empty plot || Ev Gain ↑ |- | #59 [[File:Kee.png|25px]] || [[Kee]] || style="text-align:right" | 1 || style="text-align:right" | 3000 {{farmpoints}} || 10 hr 6 min to ripe
10 hr 6 min to death || Grow Liechi and Ganlon Berries near an empty plot || N/A |- | #60 [[File:Maranga.png|25px]] || [[Maranga]] || style="text-align:right" | 1 || style="text-align:right" | 8000 {{farmpoints}} || 11 hr 12 min to ripe
11 hr 12 min to death || Grow Salac and Petaya Berries near an empty plot || N/A |- | #61 [[File:Liechi.png|25px]] || [[Liechi]] || style="text-align:right" | 0.5 || style="text-align:right" | 10000 {{farmpoints}} || 48 hr to ripe
48 hr to death || Grow Passho berries and have captured Kyogre || N/A |- | #62 [[File:Ganlon.png|25px]] || [[Ganlon]] || style="text-align:right" | 0.5 || style="text-align:right" | 10000 {{farmpoints}} || 48 hr to ripe
48 hr to death || Grow Shuca berries and have captured Groudon || N/A |- | #63 [[File:Salac.png|25px]] || [[Salac]] || style="text-align:right" | 0.5 || style="text-align:right" | 10000 {{farmpoints}} || 48 hr to ripe
48 hr to death || Grow Coba berries and have captured Rayquaza || N/A |- | #64 [[File:Petaya.png|25px]] || [[Petaya]] || style="text-align:right" | 0.5 || style="text-align:right" | 15000 {{farmpoints}} || 24 hr to ripe
96 hr to death || Grow all Gen 4 Berries with an open plot and all plots unlocked,
need all Gen 4 Berries unlocked || Prevents non-Petaya berries from withering |- | #65 [[File:Apicot.png|25px]] || [[Apicot]] || style="text-align:right" | 0.5 || style="text-align:right" | 15000 {{farmpoints}} || 24 hr to ripe
96 hr to death || Grow Chilan berries and have captured Palkia || N/A |- | #66 [[File:Lansat.png|25px]] || [[Lansat]] || style="text-align:right" | 0.5 || style="text-align:right" | 15000 {{farmpoints}} || 24 hr to ripe
96 hr to death || Grow Roseli berries and have captured Dialga || N/A |- | #67 [[File:Starf.png|25px]] || [[Starf]] || style="text-align:right" | 0.5 || style="text-align:right" | 15000 {{farmpoints}} || 24 hr to ripe
96 hr to death || Discover a shiny wandering Pokémon with an open plot || Shiny Chance ↑ |- | #68 [[File:Enigma.png|25px]] || [[Enigma]] || style="text-align:right" | 0.5 || style="text-align:right" | 15000 {{farmpoints}} || 24 hr to ripe
144 hr to death || Unique based on linked Discord account || Can mutate some Gen 4 berries into Gen 5 berries
(Must have unlocked the Gen 5 berry first) |- |}
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
